text: Jean-Pierre Raffarin (; born 3 August 1948) is a French politician. He was Prime Minister of France from 6 May 2002 to 31 May 2005. He was also Vice President of the Senate from 2011 to 2014. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Poitiers
title: Jean-Pierre Raffarin
